Articles.Content:
Under Reconstruction. Please check back at a later date.

Edited April 27, 2013 by Tetriswizard
I loved thunderbirds as a kid! Can\'t wait for this!

This is awesome.

Now we take this + countdown plugin + '5. 4. 3. 2. 1. PGGGGGGGG Thunderbirds are go' sound = epicnessrainbowoutofmouth.
Watching Thunderbirds as a kid was one of my favorite pass times.

I intend on making Thunderbird 1, Thunderbird 2, Thunderbird 3 (Done almost), and Thunderbird 5

Hope you guys like it, and im going to add in some minor details aswell, so im not done here.

Thunderbird 2. Do want.

Anyone remember Thunderbird 6 from one of the movies?
Ahahaha I\'m gonna have to show my dad KSP now thanks

I have the remastered UK DVD box.

It includes some very nice, original and very detailed drawings of all the vehicles (even the Mole ^^) and the Tracy Island.

Could it be useful for you?

It has a print button, so I could make some pdf\'s if you like.

Edit: I saw that some dvd\'s also have the original bmp\'s.

I\'ve attached a low resolution version of it (15% of the original size).

What do you think. Useful or not?
The next step, once it is possible, is clearly to replace the kerbals with 3D models of marionettes flailing about madly. Someone who knows how must make this happen 8)
Mm just thought about a very far future when we might be able to make our own Kerbal models like Jeb... The Tracy Family!!

Its good to see this is doing well. Im going to redo the thrust and the fuel limits to be enough for a trip to a spacestation and back.

I have the remastered UK DVD box.

It includes some very nice, original and very detailed drawings of all the vehicles (even the Mole ^^) and the Tracy Island.

Could it be useful for you?

It has a print button, so I could make some pdf\'s if you like.

Edit: I saw that some dvd\'s also have the original bmp\'s.

I\'ve attached a low resolution version of it (15% of the original size).

What do you think. Useful or not?

Nice, and Thanks, I\'m gonna have to do some changes to the models to accommodate some of the details. I don\'t ever remember the 4 holes on the side thrusters, so I might make 2 variants, one with the holes, one without.

This is awesome.

Now we take this + countdown plugin + '5. 4. 3. 2. 1. PGGGGGGGG Thunderbirds are go' sound = epicnessrainbowoutofmouth.

Maybe if you were to make one

I loved thunderbirds as a kid! Can\'t wait for this!

I used to get up every morning and watch it

Anyone remember Thunderbird 6 from one of the movies?

Lol, you want a biplane?

I was thinking powerful landing legs could be used to make a mun hopper like in captain scarlet...

Lol, you want a biplane?

I was thinking powerful landing legs could be used to make a mun hopper like in captain scarlet...

-snip-

Who knows, after i have done them all, i might move to Captain scarlet and Space 1999

Edit:

I\'ves started work on the Thunderbird 5, and I\'m just getting details into the roundhouse. Soon I\'ll start on the Neck and the details of it.

Wow it looks awesome.

It would be so cool to have that thing orbiting kerbin! ;D

You\'ll probably have enough reference images around you, but I couldn\'t resist to upload this one for you.

I resized it 50% else it was to large for the forum.
Anyone got a craft file for the thunderbird?
